column5: I am starting to plan my yearly icefishing trip up to Lake Bernard, and was researching augers.  I was just wondering if any of you guys have the Eskimo Stingray, and if so, what do you think of it??  Any other suggestions?
my Eskimo works great!  Mako I think?
Just saw that auger in cabelas bargan cave -new this week -priced at 299.00

I have had that auger for about 5 years now.  The thing is awesome, starts quickly and we use it most weekend in the winter and am still on the original blades.  The thing goes through ice like a hot knife through butter, and we do not push it down, just let it eat its way through the ice.  and we get upwards of 2.5-3ft on ice here
Me too, had mine over 5 years and it's been awesome. Make sure to run Premium fuel in it also. It'll start faster and run better.
